mapper.select:
SELECT `p`.`id`, `p`.`name`, `p`.`url`, `p`.`is_menu`, `p`.`is_default`, `p`.`is_blank`, `p`.`icon_class`, `p`.`parent_id`, `parent`.`name` AS `parent_name`, `p`.`order`, `p`.`remark` FROM `sys_page` `p` LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_page` `parent` ON `p`.`parent_id` = `parent`.`id`
`p`.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY `p`.`parent_id` ASC, `p`.`order` ASC

SELECT `page`.`id`, `page`.`name`, `page`.`url`, `page`.`is_menu`, `page`.`is_default`, `page`.`icon_class`, `page`.`parent_id`, `parent`.`name` AS `parent_name`, `page`.`order`, `page`.`remark`, `p`.`can_insert`, `p`.`can_delete`, `p`.`can_update`, `p`.`can_select` FROM `sys_page` `page` LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_permission` `p` ON `page`.`id` = `p`.`sys_page_id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_role` `r` ON `r`.`id` = `p`.`sys_role_id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_admin` `a` ON `a`.`sys_role_id` = `r`.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_page` `parent` ON `page`.`parent_id` = `parent`.`id` WHERE `a`.`id` = #{adminId}
